content.rendered:
2025 Story - Submit an Entry

Before you enter your story, do make sure you have read the eligibility and entry guidelines from the link in the previous page.

Please note that you will see a confirmation page with a reference number when you have successfully submitted your short story.

If you experience any problems with submission please email: creatives@commonwealthfoundation.com

* Denotes required fields

  • Author's Details

  • (must be 18 years or older on 1 November 2024)
  • (including country code)

  • Entry Details

  • Accepted file types: pdf, txt, rtf, doc, docx, Max. file size: 8 MB.
    Your story should be in PDF format but if this is not possible, you may upload a Word document, TXT or RTF file. Please remember to use the title of the story as the file name.
